display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (all apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal + hypopneas with > 30% airflow reduction and with > 3% desaturation or with arousal) / hour of sleep
calculation: 60 * (hremba3 + hroa3 + hnrba3 + hnroa3 + urbpa3 + uropa3 + unrbpa3 + unropa3 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop + oarbp + oarop + oanbp + oanop ) / slptimetotal
